availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Meekey Lane Vertrees. Father of John Vertrees, Samuel Vertrees, Emily Benham Vertrees, Miles Vertrees, Isaac Vertrees, Squire Vertrees, James Vertrees, Scott Vertrees, Taylor Vertrees, and Alice Vertrees. Farmer in Meade County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in McLean County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Kentucky District, p. 171. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 32.
